sentences.en: Culture the fry in the hatchery cages.
sentences.cn: 在孵化网箱内进行鱼苗培育。

sentences.en: L Jensen is manager of the Leavenworth National Fish Hatchery.
sentences.cn: 是李文次国家鱼类孵卵所的所长。

sentences.en: The ability cannot be used again on that Hatchery until those 4 larva have spawned.
sentences.cn: 这个技能在那4个幼虫被消耗之前不能再释放在基地上。
